definition: delicate
lovable/pampered/tender/delicate/frail
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: Melanie was so delicate. She couldn't stand two days of this pain .
sentences.chinese: 可是媚蘭身體這樣嬌弱，她一定經不起兩天的折磨。

sentences.english: He perceives his delicate constitution , and the necessity of treating him tolerably.
sentences.chinese: 他看到他嬌弱的體質，有必要對他寬厚些。

sentences.english: You are delicate as a flower and you need love to survive.
sentences.chinese: 你如花朵般嬌弱，需要愛的滋養。

sentences.english: The original fragile flowers ah, but it has an indomitable spirit.
sentences.chinese: 這些原本嬌弱的花朵啊，卻有着不屈不撓的精神。

sentences.english: E. g. Only the gentlest creams are fit for a baby's delicate skin.
sentences.chinese: 只有最溫和的面霜才適合寶寶嬌弱的皮膚。

sentences.english: He is a delicate child who is often ill.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個經常生病的嬌弱的孩子。

sentences.english: Look at you, as fragile as a flower.
sentences.chinese: 看看你自己，嬌弱的像一朵花。

sentences.english: In stature she was tall, somewhat slender, and in her latter days, even emaciated.
sentences.chinese: 她身材修長，有點嬌弱，臨死前，竟是形銷骨立。

sentences.english: But Melanie was so delicate. She couldn't stand two days of this pain .
sentences.chinese: 可是媚蘭身體這樣嬌弱，她一定經不起兩天的折磨。

definition: lit. twice every three days (idiom); practically every day/frequently
to grow teeth/to teethe
tusk
penniless
sneering/sarcasm/cynical remarks
lit. doesn't hurt, doesn't tickle (idiom); sth is wrong, but not quite sure what/fig. not getting to any matter of substance/scratching the surface/superficial/perfunctory
soft skin and tender flesh (idiom)/smooth-skinned
to feel apprehensive/to be alarmed
to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
the person who shares your bed/partner/spouse
carelessly and haphazardly/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
to belittle/to scorn/to take sth lightly
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
face glowing (idiom); looking radiant/all smiles
to have tender affection for/to love tenderly/to pamper sb
righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
